description: This table contains information about scheduled payments. This can include payment plan auto pay agreements and payments, Visit Auto Pay payment plans and payments, and trust transfers and payments.

columns.name: SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the scheduled payment record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Record name

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENT
columns.description: This column stores the external identifier for the scheduled payment.

columns.name: SCHED_PMT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the scheduled payment record type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payment Plan Auto Pay Agreement


Trust Recurring Payment


Visit Auto Pay Agreement


Visit Auto Pay One-Time Payment


Trust Recurring Transfer


Payment Plan Auto Pay Payment

columns.name: SCHED_PMT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the scheduled payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled


Unscheduled


Completed


Deactivated


Replaced


Suspended


In Progress


Skipped


Pending Consent


Pending Statement


Voided


Canceled


Terminated


Signed Up

columns.name: IS_ACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the scheduled payment record is considered active. 'Y' indicates that the payment record is active. 'N' indicates that it is inactive.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes

columns.name: ORIGINAL_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: Stores the original record that was replaced with the current scheduled payment record.

columns.name: PARENT_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: Stores the parent scheduled payment record associated with the current scheduled payment record.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: Stores the service area associated with the scheduled payment.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: Stores the guarantor account associated with the scheduled payment.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: Stores the hospital account associated with the scheduled payment.

columns.name: CARD_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payment method record of the scheduled payment.

columns.name: PMT_PROCESS_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the processing mode of the scheduled payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Fixed Amount


Up To Amount


Patient Responsibility 


One-Time Payment

columns.name: PMT_PROCESS_MODE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount associated with the payment processing mode for the scheduled payment.

columns.name: RECUR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the recurrence type of the scheduled payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Monthly

columns.name: RECUR_DAY_OF_MONTH
columns.description: Stores the recurrence day of month if it is a monthly scheduled payment.

columns.name: RECUR_DAY_OF_WEEK_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the recurrence day of week if it is a bi-weekly or weekly scheduled payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sunday


Monday


Tuesday


Wednesday


Thursday


Friday


Saturday

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: Stores the start date of the scheduled payment.

columns.name: EXP_DATE
columns.description: Stores the expiration date of the scheduled payment.

columns.name: CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant at which the scheduled payment record is created.

columns.name: CREATION_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source from which the payment schedule was created. For example, It will tell if the scheduled payment was setup through Hyperspace, or MyChart Web etc.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hyperspace


MyChart Web


MyChart Mobile


Welcome


SBO Conversion


Payment Plan Import Utility


System Action


Advance Bill

columns.name: CREATION_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who set up the scheduled payment.

columns.name: CREATION_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the MyChart account that set up the scheduled payment.

columns.name: NEXT_PMT_DATE
columns.description: Stores the next date on which the payment will be processed.

columns.name: NEXT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount that will be processed on the next scheduled date.

columns.name: POSTED_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total amount processed and posted in the system by the scheduled payment.

columns.name: REMAINING_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the remaining amount that can be processed to the payment method if the payment processing mode is "Up To Amount."

columns.name: LAST_PROCESS_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date when the payment method was last processed.

columns.name: LAST_PROCESS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount that was processed during the last attempt.

columns.name: LAST_PROCESS_CARD_TX_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the last processing attempt.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Error


Accepted


Declined

columns.name: LAST_PROCESS_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who attempted the last processing of the payment method.

columns.name: LAST_STATUS_DATE
columns.description: Shows the date on which the payment schedule was set to the current status.

columns.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS_OVRIDE
columns.description: If set, this email will be used when sending notifications for this scheduled payment instead of the guarantor's email.

columns.name: MOBILE_PHONE_OVRIDE
columns.description: If set, this mobile phone number will be used when sending notifications for this scheduled payment instead of the guarantor's mobile phone number.

columns.name: TRANSFER_FROM_GUAR_ID
columns.description: Stores the source guarantor account associated with the scheduled trust transfer.

columns.name: LAST_BSP_CONSENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of the most current consent for the Visit Auto Pay agreement represented by this scheduled payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Verbal


Paper - Not Yet Scanned


Paper - Scanned


E-Signature


Self Service

columns.name: LAST_CONSENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that collected or updated the most current consent for the Visit Auto Pay agreement represented by this scheduled payment.

columns.name: LAST_CONSENT_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The document representing the most current consent for the Visit Auto Pay agreement represented by this BSP.

columns.name: CONSENT_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient consented to the terms for this scheduled payment.

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date at which the scheduled payment record was created.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant (local, guarantor's time zone) in which the scheduled payment record was resolved, either by completing successfully or being cancelled.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_DATE
columns.description: The date in which the scheduled payment record was resolved, either by completing successfully or being cancelled.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The resolution status category ID for this scheduled payment record. Use this to indicate the extent to which a the agreement was successful in collecting a payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payment Received


Partial Payment


No Payment Needed


Never Active

columns.name: RESOLUTION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The resolution reason category ID for this scheduled payment. Use this to indicate the specific path-to-arrival to a resolution status (RESOLUTION_STATUS_C).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Self-Pay Liability Covered


No Self-Pay Liability


Self-Pay Liability Exceeded Threshold


Consent Not Received


Consent Duration Exceeded


Canceled by Patient


Canceled by User


Voided


Sent to Payment Plan


Sent to Bad Debt


Guarantor Changed


Notification Failed


Canceled by System


Automatic Payment Declined


Appointment Canceled


System Error


Account Contested

columns.name: CANCELLATION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cancelation reason category ID for this scheduled payment. This column can be used to see the user-specified reason that a patient is canceling the agreement.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Financial Status Changed


Changed Mind


Disputed Terms


Patient Canceled


Legal

columns.name: TOTAL_SP_RESP_AMT
columns.description: This column contains the total self-pay responsibility on a Visit Auto Pay agreement, regardless of the agreement being cancelled.

columns.name: ALL_HAR_BAL_IN_FULL_SP_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the most recent date in which all balances were on self-pay for all associated hospital accounts.

columns.name: LAST_CONSENT_DTTM
columns.description: The consent date and time for the Visit Auto Pay agreement.

columns.name: CUR_ACTIVE_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the current active agreement (Visit Auto Pay or Payment Plans) in a replacement chain for any given agreement. If the agreement is not in a replacement chain, this column will match the agreement ID.

columns.name: CANCELLATION_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the user who canceled the scheduled payment.

columns.name: CANCELLATION_MYPT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the MyChart account that canceled the scheduled payment.

columns.name: FINAL_RESOLUTION_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date when the agreement was resolved and all charges were in full self-pay for all accounts.  - If the agreement is not resolved, this column will be empty. - If the agreement has any visit where all charges are not in full self-pay, this column will be empty - If both the agreement is resolved and all charges on all visits are in full self-pay, this column will contain the last of these two dates (using RESOLUTION_DATE and ALL_HAR_BAL_IN_FULL_SP_DATE)

columns.name: FINAL_VAP_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the final Visit Auto Pay agreement for a visit. This is determined by finding either the current active Visit Auto Pay agreement or finding the agreement that was most recently resolved. This uses the associated hospital account for Hospital Billing and the associated visit for Professional Billing.

columns.name: VISIT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the visit date of the primary visit at the time of consent.

columns.name: VISIT_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the department of the primary visit at the time of consent.

columns.name: CREATION_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the department in which the user was logged into at the time of consent. This will be empty for agreements created via MyChart or Welcome.

columns.name: PAT_PMT_COLL_WKFL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the workflow category ID performed to collect a patient payment from the point of view of the user. For example, MyChart eCheck-in vs. MyChart One-Touch.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Staff Collected


MyChart Billing


MyChart One-Touch


MyChart Pay as Guest


MyChart Visit Payment


MyChart eCheck-in


Welcome Balance Payment


Welcome Check-in


Two-Way SMS


Payment Posting


Lockbox


Release of Information


Willow Ambulatory


Web Service

columns.name: MYC_SIGNIN_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column denotes how the patient or guarantor logged in to MyChart to create the agreement. Only populated for agreements made via MyChart.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Password Sign-in


Demographics Sign-in


No Sign-in

columns.name: GUAR_MYC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the MyChart account status for the guarantor at the time the agreement is created or updated.  An active MyChart account status is defined as whether a MyChart user could log into the account with a user name and password. Accounts that are not yet active, deactivated, or are proxy accounts are considered inactive.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ACTIVE


INACTIVE

columns.name: CREATION_MYC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the MyChart account status for the MyChart account who created or last updated the agreement.  An active MyChart account status is defined as whether a MyChart user could log into the account with a user name and password. Accounts that are not yet active, deactivated, or are proxy accounts are considered inactive.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: GUAR_MYC_STATUS_C_NAME
